title: Interface engineering toward stable lithium–sulfur batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,1330-1367
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE04183B, Review Article
Yi Guo, Qian Niu, Fei Pei, Qian Wang, Yun Zhang, Liyu Du, Yin Zhang, Yunsheng Zhang, Yueying Zhang, Ling Fan, Qianyu Zhang, Lixia Yuan, Yunhui Huang
The interfaces, interfacial issues, and their impact on lithium–sulfur electrochemistry are overviewed for both coin cells and practical lithium–sulfur batteries.
